text: Ara smarana karuna, yakhana mara'iyama—putra ‘isa balechilena, ‘he bani isara'ila! Niscaya ami tomadera kache allahara rasula ebam amara purba theke tomadera kache ye ta'orata rayeche ami tara satyayanakari ebam amara pare ahamada name [1] ye rasula asabena ami tara susambadadata [2]. Pare tini [3] yakhana suspasta pramanadisaha tadera kache asalena takhana tara balate lagala, eta to spasta jadu.’
